EmailTemplate.name: 201908_EMEAI_GCC_Event_MC.201908_EMEAI_Save_the_Date_2_GCC_Event_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date: Global Customer Committee Meeting, Berlin 9th – 10th October 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> You Are Invited Save the date DATE 9th - 10th October
LOCATION Berlin
We are delighted to announce the EMEAI edition of the Global Customer Committee meeting will be taking place in Berlin on 9th – 10th October.
We would love to see you there. You will receive a formal invitation from us shortly, but in the meantime, please save the date in your calendar. We look forward to meeting with you in Berlin.
